bio:
We are new to Guru, however have been delivering customized solutions to happy customers worldwide. We reward our repeat customers with attractive discounts for future projects.

Get ready for the Mobile and Cloud data explosion and transition. Focus on your IT Strategy, and take the stress out of your IT Implementation while improving your bottom-line. Ideally suited for small to mid-size businesses that have just enough resources to plan and strategize their next big IT move, and very little time to worry about implementation. 
Larger corporations that are looking to cut costs (outsourcing or subcontracting) can benefit from our maintenance services. SumCube’s Software services are here to help you make that transition providing you numerous advantages: Customized solutions at costs that are lower than in-house implementation 
High reliability with domain expertise 
US based management 
Save on project costs and get higher ROI 
Develop Platforms that keep you ahead of your Competition.

Services Provided: Web Design & Maintenance, Software Development, Data Migration, Custom Application Development and Data Security

SumCube's goal is customer satisfaction. We customize services to your requirements for your success.

Payment Terms: 

30% Advance after finalizing the scope of the project

Balance upon completion of the project.

WARRANTY/SUPPORT

Support terms are as per negotiated price quotes, and can vary by custom

Limitation of Liability. You are solely responsible for adequate protection and backup of the data and equipment used in connection with the services provide. SumCube International LLC., does not guarantee that use of the Product/Services/Software will be uninterrupted or error-free.  SumCube International LLC does not guarantee that the information accessed by the Services will be accurate or complete. You acknowledge that performance of the Services may be affected by any number of factors, including without limitation, technical failure of the Services, the acts or omissions of third parties and other causes reasonably beyond the control of SumCube International LLC. IN NO EVENT WILL SUMCUBE INTERNATIONAL LLC BE LIABLE TO YOU OR ANY THIRD PARTY FOR ANY DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF THE SUBJECT MATTER OF THIS AGREEMENT, ANY SERVICES UNDER ANY CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, STRICT LIABILITY OR OTHER THEORY, FOR ANY INDIRECT, SPECIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING LOST PROFITS), OR FOR LOSS OF OR CORRUPTION OF DATA, OR FOR COST OF PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE SERVICES OR TECHNOLOGY, IRRESPECTIVE OF WHETHER SUMCUBE INTERNATIONAL LLC HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. SUMCUBE INTERNATIONAL LLC'S MAXIMUM LIABILITY FOR DAMAGES SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE SERVICES PRICE RECEIVED BY SUMCUBE INTERNATIONAL LLC UNDER THIS AGREEMENT OR WORK TERMS FOR THE PARTICULAR SERVICE WHICH CAUSED THE DAMAGES. Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of incidental or consequential damages, so the above limitation or exclusion may not apply to You.

abstrac: We are the team of professional software expertise, working on last five years with good reputation and provide best industry level services to client.
bio:
More than 5 years of experience in software development. Created real-time web applications, complex back-end management systems including content management, e-commerce, customer relations and communication interfaces. The projects based on PHP in conjunction with various other web development technologies. PHP (pure PHP, PHP with OOP, PHP with frameworks), SQL (generic SQL, MySQL, ORM), JavaScript (generic JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX), Comet server (real-time data streaming), XHTML, CSS, XML and SVN are used. 

We have worked in the following Areas: 

• web site development with security access, supplier order form, category manager, supplier and retailer registration forms
• real-time web applications
• dynamic content applications
• e-commerce applications
• multi-level affiliate systems
• ads/clicks network systems
• content management systems
• file upload/download management systems
• management systems in general

Key Skills: Drupal 7, Magento , Zend Framework , Yii , Ruby On Rails (version - 4.0)

For: PepleChoice Team 
 
1. PepleChoice Team, will plan, design, and code a web site for the individual or corporation named above, referred to in this document as "Client", to the specifications in the attached SITE SPECIFICATION.
 
2. The estimate included here covers only that which is described in the SITE SPECIFICATION. Additional work will result in additional charges. 
 
3. To maintain our portfolio credentials, and the integrity of any applicable copyrights, PepleChoice Team shall be entitled to place an unobtrusive credit with a hypertext link ("Powered by…") in the footer on each page of the web site. PepleChoice Team  is also entitled to reproduce samples of Client’s web site in our portfolio and in any marketing materials.


ESTIMATE AND PAYMENT ARRANGEMENTS

4. PepleChoice Team estimates that the cost for producing the site described in the attached SITE SPECIFICATION will be $$
 
5. Client agrees to pay PepleChoice Team for any additional expenses necessary for the completion of the work. Examples would be : purchase of special fonts, graphics, stock photography, templates, themes, software, scripts, etc. Where additional expenses would be required PepleChoice Team will seek the Client's approval before making any purchases.
 
6. Payment shall be made as follows:
A deposit of 1/3 of estimated total, $$, is due upon signing of this Agreement, before work begins; a final payment (adjusted again for changes in estimate if necessary) is due upon completion of site as specified, before site is published on the Internet.
 
7. If the production process takes longer than 60 days, billing will switch to semi-monthly and will be based on hours expended, while still honoring this estimate, with invoices sent mid-month and at month's end.

bio:
We are the TOP RATED Freelancer on Upwork with 100% Success Rate.

Upwork profile link: https://www.upwork.com/companies/~0145914d0d9cea38ef

Rapidsoft Technologies Pvt. Ltd. - NKC Projects Inc. is a Global Software Solution firm offering total software solution, services for Mobile and Web platforms. 

We believe in long term commitments and deliver excellent service built upon an open dialogue with clients.

We have been in the market from 2006, started with the development center in Manhattan New York, and now have a corporate office in Jackson Heights, New York and the operations team is in National Capital Region, India.

Why Rapidsoft?

Smartphone and Web ecosystem understanding
Intellectual Property Rights protection
User Experience and Usability experience
Speed without Compromise - Large resource pool 160+ resources
Reliable, Dependable and Available
90% repeat business
250+ Mobile Apps (Consumer & Enterprise Mobility)

Working with Rapidsoft is as easy as 1-2-3

1. We’ll interface

Let’s meet over the phone, via e-mail, or in person (if calling ask for Yogesh). We’ll be extremely happy to exchange ideas and discuss how
Rapidsoft can strive to make your mobile and web strategy successful. We can also explain our entire process, as to how long your project will take, what would
be the results that you can expect, or anything related, you want to know.

2. We’ll put together a Proposal for you (Fast!)

Request a Proposal and we’ll deliver it asap. Even if you don’t have
a formal requirements specifications, we can help you put one together in
no-time flat.

3. We’ll deliver

As soon as you’re ready, We’ll get started. We’ll set up a project
management system focused on your project so that you can track
development progress, view schedules, and more. At any point of time you
would have the fully functional latest version of application to review and give
feedback.

Alliances:

Blackberry Alliance Member
Microsoft Partners
Amazon Partners
Google Certified

Availability/ Work Hours:

Being an offshore development company, we believe in flexible timing, and our developers follow that religiously. We always provide an overlap of 3-4 hours to our clients.

The Sales team is available 18*7 a day. Ping them and you would get a response immediately.    

Engagement Model:

Fixed Cost Model: You share us the requirement document and we share a fixed cost based on the requirement and once finalize we start working. 
Once a Final cost is shared it remains the cost for the project until there is a scope change.

Time & Material Model: Based on hourly rate a resource is provided and billed fortnightly for the hours he spent on the project.

Dedicated Resource: A resource is allocate completely to your project at a monthly billing.

We are not limited to these engagement models, and we do improvise as per the requirement of the Clients.

Payment Terms:

This differ in each engagement model though:

Fixed Cost:

Advance payment of 30% (Based on the project size)
Milestone based payment
Last payment on UAT completion. 

T&M and Dedicated resource:

Further invoice based on the agreement whether fortnightly or monthly.

Preferred Communication:

Skype (YogeshK.Rapidsoft)
